actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Law, Immigration, and Refugees.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Law, Immigration, and Refugees

official_title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to make permanent the visa waiver program and to authorize, under certain conditions, the designation of certain member states of the European Union as visa waiver program countries.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to: (1) make the visa waiver program permanent; and (2) authorize the designation of a qualifying European Union nation as a visa waiver program country.

titles.title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to make permanent the visa waiver program and to authorize, under certain conditions, the designation of certain member states of the European Union as visa waiver program countries.
